org.xmlunit.diff

Class AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xmlunit.diff.AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain
  • Enclosing class:
    AbstractDifferenceEngine

    protected static class AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain
extends Object
    Chain of comparisons where the last comparison performed determines the final result but the first comparison with a critical difference stops the chain.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain()
      Creates a chain without any parts.
      AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain(ComparisonResult firstResult)
      Creates a chain with an initial value.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain andIfTrueThen(boolean evalNext, AbstractDifferenceEngine.DeferredComparison next)
      Adds a new part to the chain if the given predicate is true.
      AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain andThen(AbstractDifferenceEngine.DeferredComparison next)
      Adds a new part to the chain.
      ComparisonResult getFinalResult()
      Returns the current result of the evaluated chain.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain

        public AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain()
        Creates a chain without any parts.

      • AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain

        public AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain(ComparisonResult firstResult)
        Creates a chain with an initial value.

    • Method Detail

      • andThen

        public AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain andThen(AbstractDifferenceEngine.DeferredComparison next)
        Adds a new part to the chain.

        If the current result of the chain is already critical the new part will be ognored, otherwise it is evaluated and its outcome is the new result of the chain.

      • andIfTrueThen

        public AbstractDifferenceEngine.ComparisonChain andIfTrueThen(boolean evalNext,
                                                     AbstractDifferenceEngine.DeferredComparison next)
        Adds a new part to the chain if the given predicate is true.

      • getFinalResult

        public ComparisonResult getFinalResult()
        Returns the current result of the evaluated chain.
